Posts.Content: Dec 15, 2011 11:13PM tfee wrote: Hello, all. One week post op. BMX, SNB, TE. The drains are a bother, but am able to keep pain under control with the oral meds. Praying for all of you that have gone or are going through similar symptoms. We will overcome!
